Subscription

Perpetual Software Subscription Software (T&C subscriptions) SaaS (Software as a Services)
Description Perpetual licenses are sold as permanent software purchases. Updates and support requires software support contract (SWSS). Subscription Software is sold as a license for a specific time period. The subscription includes upgrades and support. SaaS is sold as a Cisco-hosted license. It is a cloud only model.
Typically Perpetual Software needs underlying hardware element or works for on-premise software only offers. Subscription Software offers on-going access to innovation for customer and benefits Cisco by providing recurring revenue. Typically, subscription software is deployed on-premise on end-user hardware. SaaS should be used for pure play SaaS offers where the customer requires no hardware or on-premise software in order to function and deliver customer value.
Can be found in... Total Asset View, Product Refresh, SWSS Renew and Attach tab Total Asset View and Subscription tab Total Asset View and Subscription tab
Data availability Fully integrated Fully integrated Almost fully integrated. The missing data: WebEx legacy (transactions from legacy WebEx system called BLiS which are not in GPL)
